languages.text: "Проктор Келлик! На суде говорили о чистках. По каким критериям будет оцениваться добросовестность кадрового состава?"

traits.locale_text: "Проктор Келлик! На суде говорили о чистках. Я и хотел бы уточнить, будут ли критерии соотвествовать букве Лекс Империалис".

languages.text: "Proctor Kellick! There was talk of purges at the trial. By what criteria will our integrity be assessed?"
languages.original_text: "Проктор Келлик! На суде говорили о чистках. По каким критериям будет оцениваться добросовестность кадрового состава?"

traits.locale_text: "Proctor Kellick! There was talk of purges at the trial. By what criteria will our integrity be assessed?"
"Proctor Kellick! There was talk of purges at the trial. By what criteria will our integrity be assessed?"
"Proctor Kellick! There was talk of purges at the trial. By what criteria will our integrity be assessed?"
"Proctor Kellick! There was talk of purges at the trial. By what criteria will our integrity be assessed?"
"Proctor Kellick! There was talk of purges at the trial. By what criteria will our integrity be assessed?"

languages.text: 「ケリック代理人！裁判で粛清の話がありました。我々の品格はどのような基準で評価されるのですか？」
languages.original_text: "Proctor Kellick! There was talk of purges at the trial. By what criteria will our integrity be assessed?"

traits.locale_text: 「ケリック代理人！裁判で粛清の話がありました。我々の品格はどのような基準で評価されるのですか？」

languages.text: "Proktor Kellick! Es gab Gerüchte von Säuberungen beim Prozess. Nach welchen Kriterien wird man unsere Integrität bewerten?"
languages.original_text: "Proctor Kellick! There was talk of purges at the trial. By what criteria will our integrity be assessed?"

traits.locale_text: "Proktor Kellick! Es gab Gerüchte von Säuberungen beim Prozess. Nach welchen Kriterien wird man unsere Integrität bewerten?"

languages.text: "Üsteğmen Kellick! Duruşmada tasfiyelerden söz edildi. Bütünlüğümüz hangi ölçütlere göre değerlendirilecek?"
languages.original_text: "Proctor Kellick! There was talk of purges at the trial. By what criteria will our integrity be assessed?"

traits.locale_text: "Üsteğmen Kellick! Duruşmada tasfiyelerden söz edildi. Bütünlüğümüz hangi ölçütlere göre değerlendirilecek?"

languages.text: «¡Procurador Kellick! Durante el juicio se habló de purgas. ¿Qué criterio se usará para evaluar nuestra integridad?».
languages.original_text: "Proctor Kellick! There was talk of purges at the trial. By what criteria will our integrity be assessed?"

traits.locale_text: «¡Procurador Kellick! Durante el juicio se habló de purgas. ¿Qué criterio se usará para evaluar nuestra integridad?».

languages.text: “科里克监察官！审判期间，行商浪人提到要对法务部进行清洗，我们应当以怎样的标准进行评估？”
languages.original_text: "Proctor Kellick! There was talk of purges at the trial. By what criteria will our integrity be assessed?"

traits.locale_text: “科里克监察官！审判期间，行商浪人提到要对法务部进行清洗，我们应当以怎样的标准进行评估？”

languages.text: « Proctor Kellick ! Des purges ont été évoquées durant le procès. Sur quels critères seront-elles basées ? »
languages.original_text: "Proctor Kellick! There was talk of purges at the trial. By what criteria will our integrity be assessed?"

traits.locale_text: « Proctor Kellick ! Des purges ont été évoquées durant le procès. Sur quels critères seront-elles basées ? »
